articles.title: Everyday Technology: What are NFTs? How are they different from cryptocurrency? - The Indian Express
articles.description: What are NFTs, NFTs Explained: What are non fungible tokens, and what makes them unique? How are they different from cryptocurrency? How do they work? Who can buy NFTs? What are the risks associated with buying NFTs? Here's your guide.
